text: Kel Mitchell net worth : Kel Mitchell is an American actor, comedian, rapper, screenwriter, producer, parodist, dancer and musician, who has a net worth of $ 2 million. Kel Mitchell first became famous as a regular cast member of the Nickelodeon sketch comedy series All That, which aired from 1994 – 1999. He is also well - known for his portrayal of Kel Kimble on the Nickelodeon sitcom Kenan & Kel, which lasted from 1996 – 2000 and his role as Ed in the 1997 major motion picture Good Burger. Kel was born on August 25, 1978 in Chicago, Illinois. Throughout the 1990s, he frequently collaborated with fellow comedian and co - star Kenan Thompson.
